remarks: A theorem pertaining to the substitution for an existentially quantified variable when the substituted variable does not occur in the quantified wff.  (Contributed by Alan Sare, 22-Jul-2012.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
cbvexsv $p |- ( E. x ph <-> E. y [ y / x ] ph ) $.
$d ph y $.
